definition: to be willing to/to be ready to/to be content with/accepting (of restriction, sacrifice, risk etc)
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
unwilling to accept/not content with (a subservient role, a mediocre result etc)

sentences.english: Is being secondary to Apple really that bad?
sentences.chinese: 甘於蘋果之後難道就真的那麼不好嗎？

sentences.english: The levels of motivation and commitment that I have witnessed at the factory deserve the highest praise.
sentences.chinese: 你們的積極主動和甘於奉獻的應該受到最高的讚揚。

sentences.english: Indead, it is that very quality is humanity which refuses to stay defeated. A kind of atubborn cheerfulness.
sentences.chinese: 但它的確是人類不甘於失敗，勇於進取的品質。

sentences.english: Indeed, it is that very quality in humanity which refuses to stay defeated. A kind of stubborn cheerfulness.
sentences.chinese: 但它的確是人類不甘於失敗，勇於進取的品質。

sentences.english: Second, like it was stated before, you must take responsabilities and then assumed them.
sentences.chinese: 第二，像之前提到的，你必須甘於負責，並努力承擔。

sentences.english: To the network " stockaded village advocate " for, impersonal person ready wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 對網絡“寨主”來說，並非人人都甘於草莽。

definition: to drift with the waves and go with the flow (idiom); to follow the crowd blindly
to stand aloof from worldly affairs
to cherish the outmoded and preserve the outworn (idiom); conservative/stickler for tradition
